protocol.name: P-G12137-1
protocol.text: Seeds were surface sterilized with 10% Bleach for 5 minutes and then rinsed 3 times with sterile water.Standard media is 0.5X concentration Murashige and Skoog salt mixture (Sigma),  3% sucrose, 0.8% agar and adjusted to pH 5.7 with KOH. The plate was kept at 4oC for 2-3 days and then transferred to a tissue culture room germinated and grown at 22oC under continuous white light.

protocol.name: P-G12137-2
protocol.text: Transgenic plants seeds were sowed on 1/2 MS medium plus 0.1% DMSO. Seedlings were grown for 4 days. Whole seedlings were collected into RNA extraction buffer. Approximately 100 mg were collected per replicate, with two biological replicates being performed.

protocol.name: P-G12137-3
protocol.text: Fragmented cRNA probes were prepared using the two-cycle amplification protocol by Affymetrix.

protocol.name: P-G12137-4
protocol.text: Approximately 100 mg plants were collected per replicate. Samples were briefly sonicated to disrupt the tissue. RNA was extracted using the RNAeasy Micro Kit (Qiagen GmbH).

protocol.name: P-G12137-5
protocol.text: Transgenic plants seeds were sowed on 1/2 MS medium plus chemical inducer (estradiol). Seedlings were grown for 4 days. Whole seedlings were collected into RNA extraction buffer. Approximately 100 mg were collected per replicate, with two biological replicates being performed.
